channel.title: Certification on Gerald Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in Certification on Gerald Nguyen

item.title: How Sun's certification exam are prepared
item.description: “Without getting into too much detail, I can tell you some of what Sun did to create their various Java certification exams. So, in the old Sun days… The whole process to create a new exam takes a long time. A first team of experts is assembled and for several months the team develops a new set of objectives. Once created, the new set of objectives go through all sorts of vetting / verification processes.
